I1.name: Clockwork Windup
description: {{sbc|Innate - The Ball:}} '''Orianna''' is accompanied by ''The Ball'', which she commands with her abilities. ''The Ball'' incurs a {{sti|cd|{{fd|0.15}}-second}} global cooldown on all abilities between casts. Additionally, ''The Ball'' attaches to '''Orianna''' if she is near it, and snaps back to her if she moves too far away from it, which incurs a {{sti|cd|{{fd|0.5}}-second}} global cooldown on all abilities.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Orianna's''' [[basic attack]]s generate a stack of ''Clockwork Winding'' for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent attacks and stacks up to 2 times. All stacks are lost when attacking a new enemy.

{{sbc|Clockwork Winding:}} '''Orianna's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{pp|10 to 50 for 6|1 to 16|formula = 10+8 every 3 levels|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}, increased by{{ft|20%|{{as|{{pp|10*0.2 to 50*0.2 for 6|1 to 16|formula = 2+1.6 every 3 levels}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 3% AP)}}}}per stack, up to {{pp|10*(1+0.2*2) to 50*(1+0.2*2) for 6|1 to 16|formula = 14+11.2 every 3 levels|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 21% AP)}} {{as|'''total bonus''' magic damage}}.
''See [[Orianna/LoL#Pets|Pets]] for more details about The Ball.''
I1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - The Ball: Orianna is accompanied by The Ball, which she commands with her abilities. The Ball incurs a 0.15-second global cooldown on all abilities between casts. Additionally, The Ball attaches to Orianna if she is near it, and snaps back to her if she moves too far away from it, which incurs a 0.5-second global cooldown on all abilities.
Innate: Orianna's basic attacks generate a stack of Clockwork Winding for 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent attacks and stacks up to 2 times. All stacks are lost when attacking a new enemy.

Clockwork Winding: Orianna's basic attacks deal 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit, increased byper stack, up to 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ 21% AP) total bonus magic damage.
See Orianna/LoL#Pets for more details about The Ball.

Q.name: Command: Attack
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Orianna''' commands ''{{ai|Clockwork Windup|Orianna|The Ball}}'' to fly to the target location and remain there, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through and nearby enemies upon arrival, reduced to {{pp|key=%|100 to 40 for 7|type=enemies hit}}.
Q.descriptionHtml: Active: Orianna commands Orianna's The Ball to fly to the target location and remain there, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and nearby enemies upon arrival, reduced to 100% − 40 for 7% (based on level).
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|60*0.4 to 180*0.4}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}
Q.notes:
* If ''The Ball'' is currently on '''Orianna''' herself, ''Command: Attack'' will have it cast to fly at least 150 units if the player attempts to cast it closer.
* ''The Ball'' does not grant {{tip|sight}} while in flight, but the sound effect of striking an enemy is audible through the Fog of War.
* '''Orianna''' cannot use {{ai|Command: Protect|Orianna}} while ''The Ball'' is in transit with ''Command: Attack'' but she may buffer {{ai|Command: Dissonance|Orianna}} and {{ai|Command: Shockwave|Orianna}} to cast once it has reached the location.
* ''The Ball'' will remain at the target location until '''Orianna''' retrieves it or if she goes beyond its leash range.
** '''Orianna''' will attempt to walk to ''Command: Attack's'' cast point if it lies outside cast range (''The Ball'' will never exceed its leash range regardless of target direction).
* {{pending for test}} ''The Ball'' will drop to the ground upon colliding with {{cai|W|Yasuo}} but not with {{cai|E|Braum}}.
** {{cai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}?

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Minimum Damage: (+ 20% AP)

W.name: Command: Dissonance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Orianna''' commands ''{{ai|Clockwork Windup|Orianna|The Ball}}'' to emit an electric pulse that deals {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an electric field that last 3 seconds, granting {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} to '''Orianna''' and her allies when they step within. Enemies that step within would be {{tip|slow|slowed}} for the same amount, decaying over 2 seconds after leaving the field.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Orianna commands Orianna's The Ball to emit an electric pulse that deals magic damage to nearby enemies.
The pulse leaves behind an electric field that last 3 seconds, granting bonus movement speed to Orianna and her allies when they step within. Enemies that step within would be slowed for the same amount, decaying over 2 seconds after leaving the field.

E.name: Command: Protect
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} ''{{ai|Clockwork Windup|Orianna|The Ball}}'' grants {{sti|armor|{{as| '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} to the unit it is attached to.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Orianna''' commands ''The Ball'' to fly to herself or the target allied {{tip|champion}} and attach itself to the target, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through and {{tip|shield|shielding}} the target for {{fd|2.5}} seconds upon arrival.
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Orianna's The Ball grants bonus armor and bonus magic resistance to the unit it is attached to.
Active: Orianna commands The Ball to fly to herself or the target allied champion and attach itself to the target, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through and shielding the target for 2.5 seconds upon arrival.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
{{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|55 to 195}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
E.notes:
* ''The Ball'' does not grant {{tip|sight}} while in flight, but the sound effect of striking an enemy is audible through the Fog of War.
* '''Orianna''' cannot cast her other abilities while the ''The Ball'' is moving to the target with ''Command: Protect''.
* '''Orianna''' gains ''Command: Protect's'' bonus resistances whenever ''The Ball'' is attached to her (even if she didn't self-cast).
* ''The Ball'' will remain where ''Command: Protect's'' target ally [[death|died]] or, if instead they die or become {{tip|untargetable}} while it is mid-flight, snap back to '''Orianna'''.
** ''The Ball'' will return to '''Orianna''' if ''Command: Protect's'' target ally moves too far away from her (''The Ball'' will always respect its [[Pets#Leash range|leash range]], which is increased by 100 when attached to allied champions).
* ''The Ball'' will join ''Command: Protect's'' target ally in {{tip|stealth}} if they are affected by it when '''Orianna''' targets them.
* ''The Ball'' snaps back to '''Orianna''' upon being intercepted by {{tip|projectile|projectile-blocking}} effects.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Shield Strength: (+ 45% AP)

R.name: Command: Shockwave
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Orianna''' commands ''{{ai|Clockwork Windup|Orianna|The Ball}}'' to unleash a shockwave that deals {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them {{pp|type=proximity to ball|325;350;700|415;250;0|formula=Non-linear.|changedisplay = true}} inward, though not through terrain.
R.descriptionHtml: Active: Orianna commands Orianna's The Ball to unleash a shockwave that deals magic damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.75 seconds, and pulling them 415;250;0 ‒ undefined inward, though not through terrain.
R.notes:
* ''Command: Shockwave'' tosses enemies a set distance (those on the edge of the flinging area will be tossed to the center while those close to the middle will go over ''The Ball'' towards the edge) and can send them through walls.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** ''Command: Shockwave'' will cast from wherever the unit the ''The Ball'' is attached to is at the end of the cast time.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
